actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide an age limit and a single 6-year term for the President.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that no person who has attained the age of seventy years shall be eligible for election to the office of President or Vice President. States that the term of office of the President and Vice President shall be six years, and no person shall be elected to the office of President more than once.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide an age limit and a single 6-year term for the President.
